feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: He had really a movement of anger against her at that moment, and it impelled him to go away without pause.

feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: He was feeling bitter disappointment, as if he had opened a door out of a suffocating place and had found it walled up.

causedByEvent.name: Finding out that the house was already taken

feels.name: Vexation
feels.quote: He was feeling bitter disappointment, as if he had opened a door out of a suffocating place and had found it walled up.

causedByEvent.name: Finding out that the house was already taken

feels.name: Satisfaction
feels.quote: He also felt sure that Rosamond was pleased with the cause of his disappointment.

causedByEvent.name: Finding out that the house was already taken

feels.name: Dread
feels.quote: That evening Lydgate was a little comforted by observing that Rosamond was more lively than she had usually been of late, and even seemed interested in doing what would please him without being asked.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: She trusted to the chance that nothing more would pass between her husband and the auctioneer until some issue should have justified her interference.

causedByEvent.name: Preventing further discussion about the house

hasObject.name: Preventing further discussion about the house
